androidMessage:
New version of the SPEN To PC has been released with following changes:

- Added Air Actions support for motion gestures (Swipe & Rotate)
- Check for updates when launch

 Press "Check for Updates" to download
windowsMessage:
New version of the SPEN To PC has been released with following changes:

- Added Air Actions support for motion gestures (Swipe & Rotate)
- Check for updates when launch

 Press "Check for Updates" to download
